content.detailedDescription:
My brother called my out side when i got outside i saw what looked like a star that was flying slowly towards a field where it landed then took-off that's when everything in the house started
to go wacky lights turned off and tv and radios when to static we locked all doors and we saw 10 ape like objects walking though field which lead to us grabbing weapons an hiding late the object returned and landed and then took-off the. warped away
content.summary: Flew hovers then lands then leaves comes back later takesoff and warped away

content.detailedDescription: Saw 3lights just over the horizon while driving home. lots of activity in the sky while it was happening... seemed like3individual aircrafts they would turn on and off like in a pattern. they headed east over the theme parks towards the coast.
content.summary: Saw 3 lights. hovering over horizon

content.detailedDescription: 2 separate ufo formations within 15 min of each other over sebring at 9:45 pm on monday june 8th 2015
content.summary: {nd} 2 separate ufo formations within 15 min of each other over sebring at 9:45 pm on monday june 8th 2015

content.detailedDescription:
Bright pulsating spherical light on ground below cell tower. lights flashing white counter clockwise extremely fast. was coming home after work from columbus ohio east bound on st rte 161 when i noticed a light illuminating low clouds like an airport strobe. got markedly brighter as i got closer.
saw blinding light at ground level looking north of rte 161 approximately 1000 yards from road. travel this rte for 20 years no normal lighting in this area.
content.summary: Bright pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work worked couple of hrs. o.T. it was about 2 am. i was almost to holbrook when i noticed 3 lights in a triangle shape between holbrook and cholla power plant. i thought i've never noticed that before. soon as i thought that it just vanished.I go what. it was as if they knew ihad spotted them. 8 days latter i was going into work at papermill on rt. 377 it was around midnight in the dry lake area when i noticed the same 3 lights in a triangle shape directly above me i thought to myself those looks just like the lights i seen by holbrook and then they vanished.As if they knew hey had been spotted . i would say the two times i had seen this craft it was way well over 300 ft. across . it is they were watching the cholla power plant the first time and the papermill the second time. and didn't want to be noticed?
content.summary: Seen s.W. of holbrook az. 8 days later directly above me on rt.377 dry lake

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio with my sister, on a clear afternoon, blue sky without clouds. i was sitting on a patio chair and my sister was standing.  she noticed something in the sky so i stood up and she pointed it out to me, clearly visible above my house was a hovering/stationary silver sphere reflecting the sunlight.  we observed it for about 2 minutes and i then ran into my house to get my hd camera while my sister continued to watch the sphere.  she pointed it out to me again and i shot several still photos and 2 videos, but really the camera didn't know what to focus on, and without anything other than the lcd screen (no viewfinder on camera)i couldn't zoom in on the object.  it very slowly moved off to the south east, moving very slowly at constant altitude.  it was not a helicopter, not an airplane, not a balloon.  my sister said she saw rotating lights moving around the sphere counterclockwise but more vertical than horizontal, although i did not observe that detail.
content.summary: Silver/reflective sphere in blue sky stationary over my house

content.detailedDescription: Two huge objects which were about 3 levels in height stayed completely stationary for about 10 minutes hovering over universal studios/lockheed martin area in southwest orlando. the first one turned out lights on various levels before going invisible and then the second one did the same. they did not fly off anywhere.
content.summary: Stationary for about 10 min & then turned out lights in sequence before going invisible. about 3 levels on each. photos on phone

content.detailedDescription: I just woke up i couldn't move i tryed to talk i couldn't i saw this grey figure in front of me just looking i tryed to screen i noticed the curten moved to the chair i mustered the strength  to say help then i fell to the floor looked out side and seen it go away then the curten went back to normal i did not sleep for the rest of the night
content.summary: It looked at me and i coulldent move or talk

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from charleston to mattoon. it was a dreary day. up ahead to the south i noticed something in the sky...Which was a vivid white. first thought was it must be a plane, because i knew the coles county airport was ahead of me to the south west. the sun was in front  of me, and was peeking out of the clouds. the suns rays shined on the object, making it look illuminated, almost dream like. as i got closer, i realized i didn't know what i was seeing but that it definitely wasn't an airplane. in the middle was a solid white object. i'm not sure of the shape, but remember thinking that must be where the pilots are. it was encircled by white pipelike appendages. they went out above and below the object. it looked like a large geometric shape that you might find in a textbook. the appendages were connected to the solid shape. the shape stood still, as the appendages revolved up and over the solid object. they moved a slow 360 degree around the object . all around the object was a mist, or aura. in a way, it reminded me of the mirage that you see on a road in the summer. as the appendages turned, the object would disappear. then on their way back up, the sun would hit it and allow me to see another glimpse of it. again as the appendages turned, it disappeared again. this continued. the thought came to me that the aura was a cloaking device to make it invisible. however due to the dismal day, the sun peeking out of the clouds on the object, made it appear. it had something to do with the appendages turning. when they were coming back up, behind the object, it would reappear as the suns rays hit it. i called the airport the next day, and got an answering machine. so then i called the restaurant there, and asked if they had had any air shows there the afternoon before. she said no. i'm not sure what i saw...But it wasn't ours.
content.summary: Saw a white solid object in the sky with white appendages. appendages looked like white pipes.

content.detailedDescription: I was upstairs on my computer when my mum  told me to look out of the window, at first i thought it was an airplane but then i saw that the lights kept changing colour and that it was always moving around the same spot, i opened my window to see if i could hear any noise but there was nothing, the objects where flying at treetop level at a minimum to around 200ft in the air, my dad then pointed out that there was 2 of them and they were  always  emitting different  colours but flying near each other, they looked like they had wings that rapidly  moved as they flew, as i went to record  it on my phone one the objects flew up  really high and stayed there for  around 45 seconds, it felt as though it was watching me recording it.
content.summary: Looked like 2 dragonflies with  different colours changing constantly but no sound and kept flying around the same area hovering.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday, 06-06-15, some time around 11:30 and midnight, me and my brother in-law were standing in his garage discussing business. i noticed a star off on the horizon, it was the same size or bigger than the star next to it, but the color was more reddish orange. as i stared at it i noticed it was moving. i followed it across the sky, gaining altitude from my perspective, as it got closer i was expecting to see the flashing lights of an aircraft, i continued watching looking for lights, at this point the light was nearing 90 degrees to the horizon and my brother in-law curious as to what i was looking at, looked up at the last second to see it flash and then disappear. he asked what it was and i had no answer. as i started to tell him where i had first noticed the light there was a second one in it's place. same size, same color, same flight path, same speed, as it got closer and higher in the sky you definitely could make out the color changing between a yellowish-orange to orange to reddish-orange to red, and back and forth and again. then at it's highest point above our heads it flashed, dimmed and gone. this time my brother in-law said, that's no plane. amazingly as i looked back at where these lights came from, a third!! as the third one worked it's way across the sky i panned the rest of the sky and pointed out 2 planes in the area, you could definitely make out the flashing white light on one of the planes and the flashing red and green lights of the other. looking back at the third light it was nearing the point were the other 2 had disappeared, again, it flashed, dimmed and disappeared. as we marveled at what they could have been i blurted out, there's f-ing four of them. same spot, same thing, same flight, same disappearing act. there was no fragmenting of these objects, like something burning up in the atmosphere. they stayed consistly the same, no changes, other than color, no flashes, no sparks, no flare ups, nothing normal. the lights came from an easterly direction, heading west, slowly. from a point about 10 degrees off horizon to 90 degrees over head, to just past 90 degrees took probably 60-70 seconds.
content.summary: 4 glowing lights in a straight flight path, spaced out evenly, flitterred and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
While fishing off of a dock at kitchen lake in moore oklahoma, i observed a orange orb moving erratically left to right and up and down.  i had arrived at the dock at approximately 2300 hours.  my first observation of the orb was at 0100hrs. approximately 2 minutes later a second orange orb appeared as if out of nowhere. i began to focus my mental thoughts towards both objects saying, "please come closer".  i did this repeatedly and the first orb that i observed began to move slowly the north along the tree line at kitchen lake then it turned westward over the lake and the light reflected off the lake water. the orb changed from orange and expanded to a craft that had a large white light on the bottom that turned off and on.  the side of the craft had approximately 12 red lights lined up horizontally, they were not flashing.  there was a larger red light at the front of the craft.  the second orb had followed the exact same path and altered its shape exactly as the first had. i kept my thoughts peaceful and thankful, and i felt something inside me saying i would see them again. my contact with them was approximately 28 to 30 minutes.
i can obtain a google map of kitchen lake to better show the tree lines that i made my first observation and the entire path they followed.
content.summary: I observed one orange orb due east of my position.

content.detailedDescription:
The night of january 20th was clear and calm, the stars were out but it was a new moon and quite dark. right at 9pm i went out front to run an errand and noticed 3 sets of lights approaching very slowly from the sw. something looked strange as the objects were very low, in close formation and were completely silent. it crossed my mind that it could be some kind of military exercise but there was no engine noise and no strobe lights on the wing tips. 

i also noticed something else that got my attention: the neighborhood was unusually quiet - no barking dogs, vehicle noise or movement of any kind. it was as if time was standing still, almost surreal.

as the objects passed directly over my front yard i realized i was seeing a set of three identical, black triangles flying in an offset pattern. each craft had an oversized, round red stationary light just inside the front point (at least the size of a basketball), a smaller green light on the right wing tip and a white light on the left (the size of tennis balls). the green and white lights blinked alternately off and on in a steady pattern but were not strobing. the triangles were a flattened shape with the wingspan about double the length of the distance from the nose to the rear and were about the size of small aircraft without the tails. i could not make out any detail on the surfaces.

i snapped several photos from my cell phone as they glided overhead. (to   my later surprise and disappointment i got no images as if my camera had been blacked out.) i then jumped in my vehicle and followed the formation along highway 17 for another 4-5 minutes toward myrtle beach until it eventually went out of view. the objects seemed to maintain the low altitude and slow speed in a straight sw to ne direction along the coast.

the experience, although quite awesome and exciting, has left me unsettled. i did not plan to run an errand at 9 pm that night, but suddenly had a wild idea to go out for a late dessert, which i have never done before. i felt i was prompted to be standing out front just as the triangles appeared, as if they expected me. the timing was too perfect.
content.summary: Three black triangles glide silently over my house towards myrtle beach

content.detailedDescription:
I spend allot of time in the evening releasing some stress by shooting target archery at my home. while outside shooting archery i have my binoculars with me all the time so i can see how my arrows are grouping on the target. to break the monotony of shooting arrow after arrow i will look at the jets that fly over the house as i am practicing. with a little jet practice you can start to tell southwest airplanes, and some other major carriers due to their common colors they run. as one (dull underbelly and did not recognize jets colors) flew directly over my house i looked up and was checking the vapor trail and i see what i thought was a star. the problem was it was about 5 o'clock in the afternoon and i do not recall ever seeing a star that early in the evening during this time of year. the object appeared to be silver pulsating. not pulsating allot but like a star would. the plane appeared to pass the object and i observed the silver chrome looking object for about 10 to 15 seconds.I then remove the binoculars for my eyes looked up at the airplane and thought to myself it's awful early in the evening for start to be out i put my binoculars backed up and i could tell where i was looking because the plane was leaving a very long vapor trail. so i could trace back the flight of the airplane and i did not see anything in the tract of where i saw the unidentified object.I decided to scan the sky and horizon to see if there any stars in the sky i looked for 10 or 15 minutes and i saw nothing but blue skies and clouds. that day was somewhat cloudy but it was very open at the time of my observation.  

i do not go outside in the evening in search for funny things in the sky but this was abnormal. it wasn't a reflection it wasn't an obvious situation but it definitely was peculiar.
content.summary: Quick silver ufo by airplane

content.detailedDescription:
6-8-2015 
i have been recording moments from my newspaper delivery route, in the most commonly affected areas, or the areas where i observed patterns of strange activity and possible close encounters.
this night, on my pass to the cemetery to deliver the funeral home their subscription, i noticed a dimly reflecting surface giving movement and light play back onto my peripheral vision. i heard a dull whirring noise, and some other metal clanging noises. i saw strange lights illuminating a tree in the cemetery on my way in. i thought i saw a object moving and hovering around the cemetery below the tree line and among the oak trees near the intersection. i heard static noises. i heard what sounded like whispering.
i decided to turn back around from the next turn about and record starting out with a time and date check on my cell phone and a location check on my car's g.P.S. display, something i have become accustomed to doing.
i went back the other direction to make a u-turn and stop in a turn lane and began making note of a strange light coming from inside the cemetery.
i saw with my own eyes how it appeared to be a pale, bald man staring back at me from what looked like a modest sized porch or screened lanai with a light. i realized that there are no homes and this was closer than the opposite edge of the cemetery, and in that direction, there are only the rear and sides of adjacent businesses. i zoomed in to record what appeared to be an extraterrestrial. i noticed in the video when played back with enhanced audio gain, the presence of evp's ranging from soft whispers to loud vocalizations which are differentiated from my own speaking voice.
i noticed that the light which was to the side of the being was casting a white light tinted blue-violet purple, and then the light changed suddenly to white light tinted yellow-green.
i noted that the being seemed to be inside of a windowed room aboard a nearly silent object hovering just feet from the ground in the central darkened memorial park area of the cemetery.
when i noticed that the light stopped shining from that position to become dark in that location, i began to drive away, followed by what seemed to be a whispering noise, and when reviewing i noticed that there were clicking or clanging noises on the audio briefly which i did not hear while recording. this lasted from approx. 2:16am to approx. 2:20am.
note:
later on i overheard strange almost bird call noises and questioned whether it was a bird since a video from the other day revealed loud bird calling when i do not in the slightest recall bird singing just before a video sighting of multiple objects concurrently.
also want to make note that later after that, something had snuck up on my car and made a noise like slapping the palm of your hand on the trunk completely without rhythm, which was startling and unexpected and i could not explain it by any conventional reasoning.
content.summary: Object hovering low to cemetery reveals windows, interior, and occupant

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were at a childs park to just chill and look for shooting stars, we were looking at the sky for about 10 minutes until i noticed something moving, at first i thought it was just three birds in their formation of flying but then i focused my vision and realized that the birds were lights, and then i started to look at it more then i realized the lights had a shape in between. it was a real dark triangle, darker then the sky. at first i was kind of scared but then i was fascinated. it was all happening so quick, i warned my friend about it but he was already scared by the way i was acting, i told him it was a ufo and he freaked and i watched him run away, then i tried to look up and find it but it was gone. i tried to catch up with him, he reached my house and opened the gate to my backyard, then i saw a bright meteorite which made it even better.
content.summary: The dark triangle ufo with three lights in each corner hovered over me

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the light show at the end of the acdc concert at letzigrund stadium from the 20th floor of our building. a major lightning storm started and i grabbed my phone to take pictures of the lights from the concert coinciding with the lightning. i took all the pictures rapidly in quick succession and did not even seen the object captured in the photos until looking at the photos on my phone the next day. in the photos you can see that the object appears first as a pin point of blue/turquoise light, then develops 2 more green lights and the 4-5 total light green lights plus the bright turquoise light in the middle with a disc-shaped outline. the object appears to move around and to disappear or reduce itself to only the turquoise point of light during the lightning strikes. all photos were captured within an approx. 2 minute period through an open window with no flash. i have about 30 photos total of the object and have submitted the best 10.
content.summary: Ufo hovering near stadium with acdc concert during major lightning storm

content.detailedDescription:
We were arriving home and i decided to take a picture of the branches for a work project. i did not use flash. this could be a bug or something but since i didn't use flash i thought it seemed strange. also, i did not notice the glowing thing until i looked at the picture the next day.  

it might be nothing but it just seemed strange.
content.summary: Photo of something unidentified?

content.detailedDescription:
Hovering object seen on horizon. it got my attention when it started to glow green. then stop glowing and appeared again just to glow red this time. then is started to move to the right quite slow but with instant acceleration. quite weird. i have to mention that i was drunk and the videos i took show only steady object changing colours. the object then returned from behind the tower which is 600m away from me. estimating distance of the object ~5-10km. the object changed colour few more times and then disappeared behind the horizon. 
it would be nice if you could keep me updated if you find more reports of my observation.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering object on the horizon. changing colours. weird movement.

content.detailedDescription:
I am really just trying to find an answer to an event that happened when i was a child. i was somewhere between five and ten (i am forty-three now) when my mother and i were going through the mcdonald's drive thru in perry, georgia when i first noticed the object as it came into our line of sight because when turned the corner going around the restaurant. as we sat waiting in line facing south (towards cordele, ga) there was a bright white light that was giving off white rings (like smoke rings) coming toward us, through us, and past us. the object stayed in one spot, it did not rise, lower, or go from left to right. i would guess that the object was over a mile away. what i thought when i saw the object was that it was pretty cool (i must have been around seven or eight because i knew it was some sort of ufo and probably had already seen start wars and close encounters). if memory serves, we lost sight of the object because we left the area. afterwards i remember thinking that i had saw something extraordinary. i also remember the next day my mother telling me that it was reported as a weather balloon.

i apologize that my description is not exactly what you asked for as i was a child and the only part i really remember is where i was, who i was with (which my mother has passed now, but we did talk about the incident when i was older), and what i saw. i have searched the internet trying to find anything that would explain what i saw, but have come up with nothing. as i am now much older, i know that a weather balloon is a ridiculous answer to what i saw. and i have thought about warner robins air force base being so close, that maybe it was some type of experiment, however, the base is in the opposite direction of the the object i saw.

again, if there is any other object like this that has been reported, or if anyone else reported the same event (i am sure many people had to see it), i would really like to know.

thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: White bright circle sending out light like a smoke ring that passed through us

content.detailedDescription: A tubular shaped shadowy object about 10 parts long by one part in diameter was moving between 100 and 200 feet above ground level at roughly 30 to 40 miles per hour due west 50 feet south of the eastbound 1604 feeder road. the spacecraft had three solid colored lights of different colors at what appeared to be front, center, and rear. the craft was so low it scared [item moved/cms/nd] me, and being an aviation expert, my immediate gut feeling was that there were actual aliens looming right over my convertible in the opposite direction. at the time of sighting, i was moving 30 mph at 9:35 pm burning off time, and in addition to low vehicle noise, there almost seemed to be a momentary reduction or even absence of noise. stunned, i turn into a parking lot neighboring paisano's, however the foliage renders the craft unavailable for a photo shoot. after holding in place for 10 minutes, i hop back into the convertible and race to make a u-turn at bitters to head west in the direction of the slow, low moving craft. i take the ramp for i-10 north and immediately to my right is what appears to be the same craft with a complex disk array of lights forming a sort of saucer shape banking unnaturally between top golf and marriot at an altitude of 300 feet agl. at the same time, i'm furiously pointing at the obviously lighted craft like a retard driving 30 on the highway, and yet no one cares to acknowledge the idea that aliens are without hundreds of feet proximity. this was indeed a challenging chase for me, from poor road access and the fact that iphone cameras suck unless it's a still in the daytime. i stay on active report for the next hour with only the sight of commercial aircraft on the 12r flight path into san antonio int'l. upon the second visual interception the craft accelerated rather quickly out of the area, evading sight possibly on intent. with two strange sightings before, i am now convinced and awestruck that at least one countable alien lifeform is camping out on this planet. the object appears extremely similar to the may 31st, 2015 weather bug picture, so i be the first to validate this elongated tube craft up close and personal. for hours after the sightings, everything felt unimpressive to the technological sophistication of whatever [item moved/cms/nd]  propulsion system passing slowly above my head was on 1604.
content.summary: Most advanced propulsion system ever witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: i was asleep,that is all
content.summary: I asume implant was from the braunger sighting since i was too young to recall,but military plane did crash outside my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sky as i do most nights. my view to the north is mostly open sky. an object caught my eye when i was looking at venus.  the object appeared to be an aircraft  as it displayed flashing lights. but upon closer inspection i could determine the craft had three red lights that were flashing  . this craft was headed in a nwn direction. i observed it for about 30 seconds  when i noticed another object/light. this one was closer to me by about half the distance of the other .  this light was not sharp light venus or the other visible stars.  it had a soft like glow and what hit me right away  was it had no  flashing lights on it  at all. i watched it move in an easterly direction until it went out of my line of sight.  i watched to for about 30 seconds.
       i grew up in a town with two air bases.  i am familiar with many types of aircraft both military and civilian.  in fact it is my hobby to study military aircraft.  i am no expert but i have build almost every military aircraft model ever made !!!!! the point is ....These two did not resemble anything i have ever seen.  and while they both were just lights the lights each craft displayed  were not typical of current aircraft.
content.summary: Soft white glowing light with no aircraft warning lights flew slow and steady untilout of sight

content.detailedDescription:
While filming a video for a website my wife captured this video of a ufo traveling at high speed at the beach in gulf shores alabama. the siting was not noticed until we reviewed the video much later. see the link below and move to 49 to 60 seconds into the video and watch the upper part of the screen to see the object fly behind and above my wife out over the gulf of mexico.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: See video on youtube

content.detailedDescription: It was 4:45am in phoenix az. i was on my way to the light rail on 7th and camelback the object hovered over the mountains in north phoenix for 45 mins.. it appears very often..
content.summary: The object hovered over the mountains in north phoenix for 45 mins.. it appears very often..

content.detailedDescription: Was filming a rather severe lightening storm. after i was filming the object caught my eye but then disappeared. i looked at the recording and realized i had captured it. if you look closely, it is near the top of the frame.
content.summary: The orb just appeared while i was filming

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
After a late dinner in swedesboro, i was putting my daughter in her car seat when i looked up and saw a bright red light.  resembled a star in size and brightness, although it did seem to give a weak pulsation in brightness.  i thought it was mars, but i don't recall seeing mars that high above the horizon, nor that bright.  there were broken high altitude clouds passing over the object.  it wasn't aircraft as it appeared stationary and had no other lights that were associated with strobe lights you typically see on planes.  i wasn't sure if it was a satellite, yet i thought satellites had strobe lights on them.  if this wasn't a satellite or mars, it will be the third observation i have had have red orbs.
i lost sight when i had to get my daughter home.  i thought i might be able to pick the object back up, as we live close by.  i couldn't find it after getting home.
content.summary: Mars, satellite or unknown?

content.detailedDescription:
I was out flying the drone yesterday when i came across this white object flying very fast towards me coming from far away. ive showed many people and they all agree, we can't figure out what it is. it flies faster than a bird and never changes altitude and comes from very far away really fast. it missed my drone by a couple feet. a government device aimed at drones? an alien ufo? i doubt it but whatever it is it came fast and hard at me and we can't figure it out. you be the judge. tell me what you think and why.
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo and drone

content.detailedDescription: Was heading east on the way to work at 5:08am est and saw a bright light which looked maybe 10 to 15 miles out over atlantic ocean. i though maybe it was venus?It was very bright and didnt look like it was moving at all.I have seen and watch the iss regularly and it was not. then after maybe 3 or 4 seconds the light fizzled out.Was not a meteor do to the fact that it didnt move like one.
content.summary: Looking east saw bright light about the size of what the north star/venus. didnt look like it was moving then just fizzled out. was not the iss or meteor

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was outside on an extremely clear evening. he was watching aircraft leaving the northern kentucky cincinnati airport, which was coming east and then turning north. he turned to the west to look in that direction and then turned around east saw a bright flood like light coming towards him. being a watcher of the night sky, he aimed his high powered binoculars at the light. the light was attached to a teardrop shape craft that he estimated to be about 100 feet long 60 feet wide. it was dark in color, but he could make out some kind of symbol on the bottom side. the craft continued in a straight path towards him,when it got within about a mile of him , some kind of vapor surrounded it for about 10 seconds and then it just disappeared as if it cloaked out.

case entered by fi#19977, sketches forthcoming.
content.summary: Saw a craft with a bright light come into view, then cloak itself.
